sql_result.sql: WITH base AS (SELECT student.id FROM student JOIN class ON student.class_id = class.id WHERE class.grade_year = 2022 AND class.class_name = '计科一班' AND student.is_deleted = 0 AND class.is_deleted = 0) SELECT COUNT(*) AS student_count FROM base

entity_mappings.reason: 根据字段描述“年级/入学年份（如 2022 级）”映射，22级对应入学年份2022
根据字段描述“班级名称，班级实体映射主字段”直接匹配
